publicationStmt.p: Published as part of ELTE Verskorpusz

div.div_rhyme: aaaa aaaa aaaa aaaa aaaa aaaa aaaa aaaa aaaa aaaa aaaa aaaa aaaa
div.head: Első Ulászló Szegeden
div.p: ”Romulidae Cannas, ego Varnam claae notavi!” JANUS PANNONIUS (CESINGE JÁNOS, pécsi püspök)
